name: casdoor
tagline: An identity and single sign-on platform supporting modern auth protocols
description: Casdoor is an identity provider and SSO platform that integrates OAuth, SAML, OIDC, LDAP, and JWT. It provides customizable login templates and dashboards, and integrates easily with backend apps.

features.title: Single Sign-On
features.description: Comprehensive SSO and authentication platform. Unified access

features.title: Multiple Protocols
features.description: OAuth, SAML, OIDC, LDAP, and JWT support. Universal compatibility

features.title: Customizable Ui
features.description: Branded login pages and templates. Professional appearance

features.title: User Management
features.description: Complete user lifecycle and profile management. Centralized control

features.title: Social Login
features.description: Integration with Google, GitHub, and more. Easy authentication

features.title: Backend Integration
features.description: Easy integration with any application. Developer-friendly

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Complete control over identity infrastructure. Data sovereignty
